import React from "react"; export default function Checkout({cart, isScrolled}) { return (
{cart.length !== 0 &&

Order Information

{cart.map(item => { return (

{item.furniture.name}

USD {item.furniture.price.toLocaleString()}

x{item.quantities}

) })}

Subtotal

USD 30,000

Shipping

USD 50

Taxes

USD 300

Total

USD 22,000

}
) }
